content.question: The point <math alttext="with coordinates negative 3, comma 4 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> is on the curve defined by <math alttext="x squared, times y cubed, equals 576 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>576</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following statements is true about the curve at the point <math alttext="with coordinates negative 3, comma 4 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to x, is less than 0 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="the second derivative of y, with respect to x, is less than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to x, is less than 0 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="the second derivative of y, with respect to x, is greater than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to x, is greater than 0 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="the second derivative of y, with respect to x, is less than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to x, is greater than 0 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="the second derivative of y, with respect to x, is greater than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to x, is greater than 0 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="the second derivative of y, with respect to x, is greater than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Provide reasons or rationales for solutions and conclusions.
